TABLE.NAME: tool_coursestore
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps details of the backups that have been sent and their status.

FIELD.NAME: fileid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key into the files table.

FIELD.NAME: chunksize
FIELD.COMMENT: How big the pieces of the file will be broken into.

FIELD.NAME: totalchunks
FIELD.COMMENT: How many chunks will get sent.

FIELD.NAME: chunknumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Which chunk is currently getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this entire backup started to get sent.

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this entire backup completed getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: timechunksent
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this current chunk was started to get sent.

FIELD.NAME: timechunkcompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this current chunk was completed getting sent.

FIELD.NAME: chunkretries
FIELD.COMMENT: The total number of retries sending the current chunk.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of sending this backup.

INDEX.NAME: uq_fileid
INDEX.COMMENT: The linked file id into the files table.

INDEX.NAME: ix_filedata
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to easily retrieve the backup file details.

INDEX.NAME: ix_timecreated
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to easily retrieve the backup files in chronological order.

TABLE.NAME: tool_coursestore_log
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps a log of the course backup exports.

FIELD.NAME: coursestoreid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key into the tool_coursestore table.

FIELD.NAME: errorid
FIELD.COMMENT: The error code corresponding to this log. 0 if no error.

INDEX.NAME: ix_errorid
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to easily retrieve log records based on specific error code.

INDEX.NAME: ix_timecreated
INDEX.COMMENT: Index to easily retrieve the log records in chronological order.
